DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Different Meningitis Vaccine Formulations Adolescents Young Adults
DOC.criteria: Healthy adolescent age 10 25 year age inclusive time enrollment . History meningococcal vaccine administration ; Current previous , confirm suspected disease cause N. meningitidis ; Pregnant nursing ( breastfeed ) mother ; Females childbearing age use plan use acceptable birth control measure , duration study ; Any serious , chronic , progressive disease ; Known suspect impairment/alteration immune system ; Receipt blood , blood product and/or plasma derivative , parenteral immunoglobulin preparation within previous 90 day ; History severe allergic reaction previous vaccination hypersensitivity vaccine component .
